access_scanner_enabled.descr: True if access scanner task is enabled

alog_sleep_time.descr: Number of minutes between each sweep for the access log

alog_task_time.descr: Hour in GMT time when access scanner task is scheduled to run

alog_resident_ratio_threshold.desr: Resident ratio percentage above which we do not generate access log

alog_max_stored_items.desr: The maximum number of items the Access Scanner will hold in memory before commiting them to disk

backfill_mem_threshold.desr: Percentage of memory that backfill task is allowed to consume

bfilter_enabled.desr: Enable or disable the bloom filter

bfilter_key_count.desr: Bloomfilter: Estimated key count per vbucket

bfilter_fp_prob.desr: Bloomfilter: Allowed probability for false positives

bfilter_residency_threshold.desr: If resident ratio (during full eviction) were found less than this threshold, compaction will include all items into bloomfilter

bucket_type.descr: Bucket type in the couchbase server

compaction_exp_mem_threshold.desr: Memory usage threshold after which compaction will not queue expired items for deletion

collections_prototype_enabled.descr: Enable the collections functionality. Warning breaks upgrades and compatibility with legacy clients

collections_max_size.descr: The maximum number of collections allowed.

compression_mode.descr: Determines which compression mode the bucket operates in

compaction_write_queue_cap.desr: Disk write queue threshold after which compaction tasks will be made to snooze, if there are already pending compaction tasks

cursor_dropping_lower_mark.descr: Percentage of memQuota, below which checkpoint cursor dropping will not continue

cursor_dropping_upper_mark.descr: Percentage of memQuota, above which checkpoint cursor dropping will commence

data_traffic_enabled.descr: True if we want to enable data traffic after warmup is complete

dcp_noop_mandatory_for_v5_features.descr: Forces clients to enable noop for v5 features

defragmenter_enabled.descr: True if defragmenter task is enabled

defragmenter_interval.descr: How often defragmenter task should be run (in seconds).

defragmenter_age_threshold.descr: How old (measured in number of defragmenter passes) must a document be to be considered for degragmentation.

defragmenter_chunk_duration.descr: Maximum time (in ms) defragmentation task will run for before being paused (and resumed at the next defragmenter_interval).

enable_chk_merge.descr: True if merging closed checkpoints is enabled

ephemeral_full_policy.descr: How should an Ephemeral bucket becoming full be handled?

ephemeral_metadata_purge_age.descr: Age in seconds after which Ephemeral metadata is purged entirely from memory. Purging disabled if set to -1.

ephemeral_metadata_purge_interval.descr: Time in seconds between automatic, periodic runs of the Ephemeral metadata purge task. Periodic purging disabled if set to 0.

ephemeral_metadata_mark_stale_chunk_dura.descr: Maximum time (in ms) ephemeral hash table cleaner task will run for before being paused (and resumed at the next ephemeral_metadata_purge_interval).

ephemeral_metadata_purge_stale_chunk_dur.descr: Maximum time (in ms) ephemeral stale metadata purge task will run for before being paused (and resumed at the next ephemeral_metadata_purge_interval).

exp_pager_enabled.descr: True if expiry pager task is enabled

exp_pager_stime.descr: Number of seconds between expiry pager runs.

exp_pager_initial_run_time.descr: Hour in GMT time when expiry pager can be scheduled for initial run

getl_default_timeout.descr: The default timeout for a getl lock in (s)

getl_max_timeout.descr: The maximum timeout for a getl lock in (s)

hlc_drift_ahead_threshold_us.descr: The μs threshold of drift at which we will increment a vbucket's ahead counter.

hlc_drift_behind_threshold_us.descr: The μs threshold of drift at which we will increment a vbucket's behind counter.

ht_resize_interval.descr: Interval in seconds to wait between HashtableResizerTask executions.

ht_size.descr: Initial number of slots in HashTable objects.

item_eviction_policy.descr: Item eviction policy on cache, which is used by the item pager

item_num_based_new_chk.descr: True if the number of items in the current checkpoint plays a role in a new checkpoint creation

keep_closed_chks.descr: True if we want to keep the closed checkpoints for each vbucket unless the memory usage is above high water mark

connection_manager_interval.descr: How often connection manager task should be run (in seconds).

max_failover_entries.descr: maximum number of failover log entries

max_item_privileged_bytes.descr: Maximum number of bytes allowed for 'privileged' (system) data for an item in addition to the max_item_size bytes

max_item_size.descr: Maximum number of bytes allowed for an item

max_ttl.descr: A maximum TTL (in seconds) that will apply to all new documents, documents set with no TTL will be given this value. A value of 0 means this is disabled

max_threads.descr: Maximum number of threads in global pool

max_num_workers.descr: Bucket Priority relative to other buckets

num_reader_threads.descr: Throttle max number of reader threads

num_writer_threads.descr: Throttle max number of writer threads

num_auxio_threads.descr: Throttle max number of aux io threads

num_nonio_threads.descr: Throttle max number of non io threads

mutation_mem_threshold.desr: Percentage of memory that can be used before mutations return tmpOOMs

pager_sleep_time_ms.descr: How long in milliseconds the ItemPager will sleep for when not being requested to run

replication_throttle_cap_pcnt.descr: Percentage of total items in write queue at which we throttle replication input

replication_throttle_queue_cap.descr: Max size of a write queue to throttle incoming replication input.

replication_throttle_threshold.descr: Percentage of max mem at which we begin NAKing replication input.

dcp_backfill_byte_limit.descr: Max bytes a connection can backfill into memory

dcp_ephemeral_backfill_type.descr: Type of memory backfill done in Ephemeral buckets

dcp_flow_control_policy.descr: Flow control policy used on consumer side buffer

dcp_conn_buffer_size.descr: Size in bytes of an dcp consumer connection buffer

dcp_conn_buffer_size_max.descr: Max size in bytes of an dcp consumer connection buffer

dcp_conn_buffer_size_perc.descr: Percentage of memQuota for a dcp consumer connection buffer in dynamic flow ctl policy

dcp_conn_buffer_size_aggr_mem_threshold.descr: Aggr mem usage by all dcp conns (as percentage of memQuota) after which only dcp_conn_buffer_size is allocated

dcp_conn_buffer_size_aggressive_perc.descr: Percentage of memQuota for all dcp consumer connection buffers in aggressive flow ctl policy

dcp_enable_noop.descr: Whether or not dcp connections should use no-ops

dcp_min_compression_ratio.desr: Compression ratio to be achieved above which producer will ship documents as is

dcp_idle_timeout.descr: The maximum number of seconds between dcp messages before a connection is disconnected

dcp_noop_tx_interval.descr: The time interval in seconds between noop messages being sent to the consumer

dcp_max_unacked_bytes.descr: Amount of processed bytes before an ack is required

dcp_scan_byte_limit.descr: Max bytes that can be read in a single disk scan

dcp_scan_item_limit.descr: Max items that can be read in a single disk scan

dcp_takeover_max_time.descr: Max amount of time for takeover send (in seconds) after which front end ops would return ETMPFAIL

dcp_producer_snapshot_marker_yield_limit.descr: The number of snapshots before ActiveStreamCheckpointProcessorTask::run yields.

dcp_consumer_process_buffered_messages_y.descr: The number of processBufferedMessages iterations before forcing the task to yield.

dcp_consumer_process_buffered_messages_b.descr: The maximum number of items stream->processBufferedMessages will consume.

fsync_after_every_n_bytes_written.descr: Perform a file sync() operation after every N bytes written. Disabled if set to 0.

rocksdb_cf_options.descr: RocksDB Column Family Options, comma separated.

rocksdb_bbt_options.descr: RocksDB Block Based Table Options, comma separated.

rocksdb_low_pri_background_threads.descr: Number of RocksDB low priority background threads. 0 = auto-select.

rocksdb_high_pri_background_threads.descr: Number of RocksDB high priority background threads. 0 = auto-select.

rocksdb_stats_level.descr: RocksDB Statistics 'stats_level'. Possible values: {'', 'kAll', 'kExceptTimeForMutex', 'kExceptDetailedTimers'}. The empty value disables Statistics.

rocksdb_block_cache_ratio.descr: RocksDB Block Cache ratio of the Bucket Quota. A value of 0.0 sets to the default.

rocksdb_default_cf_mem_budget.descr: Memtable memory budget (in Bytes) for the 'default' Column Family.

rocksdb_seqno_cf_mem_budget.descr: Memtable memory budget (in Bytes) for the 'seqno' Column Family.

rocksdb_default_cf_optimize_compaction.descr: Enable Compaction Optimization for the 'default' ColumnFamily.

rocksdb_seqno_cf_optimize_compaction.descr: Enable Compaction Optimization for the 'seqno' ColumnFamily.

time_synchronization.descr: No longer supported. This config parameter has no effect.

warmup_batch_size.descr: The size of each batch loaded during warmup.

warmup_min_memory_threshold.descr: Percentage of max mem warmed up before we enable traffic.

warmup_min_items_threshold.descr: Percentage of total items warmed up before we enable traffic.
